document_data.name: Fargoren Thundermist
document_data.mainbody: '''Fargoren Thundermist''' was a [[voadkyn]], or wood giant, who lived in the forests in [[Shadowdale]] around the year [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Fargoren was suspicious and quiet of most races, but friendly to [[elves]]. He would not necessarily talk to or assist travelers in the woods, nor would he attack them on sight.

Appendix.Appearances: * [[The Sword of the Dales (adventure)|''The Sword of the Dales'']]
